summary: College football is a sport played by student-athletes at universities, mainly in the U.S. and Canada. It's governed by the NCAA in the U.S. and U Sports in Canada. While popular, especially in the South and Midwest, it's considered a second tier to professional football. Many college players later join pro leagues like the NFL, with only a small percentage making it. It's a path to professional football, with the NFL draft selecting top college players each year.
title: College football
